additional_ability.name: Street Code
additional_ability.description: When there are 2 or more Cunning Hares characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases with fewer enemies in combat, up to a max of 45%/56%/67%/78%/90%.

chain_attack.description:

Uses machine guns and cannons to continuously attack the target, dealing massive Physical DMG.
